q1.content: Bills can fluctuate over the course of a year. Seasons change, there are holidays and special events, school starts and ends, and so on. Tell me all about how your bills have fluctuated over the past year.
q1.requirement: Explore how the interviewee's bills have varied throughout the year due to different factors.

q2.content: Tell me all about how you coped with any extra expenses in the past months.
q2.requirement: Learn about the strategies the interviewee used to manage additional expenses.
